subject: Re: [junit] Question regarding ant and junit
msgSnippet: Hi Veena,   Looks like simple problem.   You need to specify the class to be executed directly. In ant script $ refers to some variable whose value is set

Hi Veena,
=A0
Looks like simple problem.
=A0
You need to specify the class =
to be executed directly. In ant script $"" refers to some variable whose va=
lue is set in the script.
=A0
Try with this it should work
=A0
<test name=
=3D"com. test.package. ProgramTest"/>

=A0
Regards,
Prathibha
